thread.title: Hrithik Roshan yet to take call on Nikhil Advani's 'Bazaar'
thread.title_full: Hrithik Roshan yet to take call on Nikhil Advani's 'Bazaar' - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Hrithik Roshan yet to take call on Nikhil Advani's 'Bazaar'
text:
Director Nikhil Advani said Hrithik Roshan has not walked out of his next project "Bazzar" and the actor is yet to give the final nod.*Hrithik Roshan and Nikhil Advani*
Gossip mills were abuzz that Hrithik had walked out of the project after Nikhil's unsuccessful films - "Hero" and "Katti Batti" but the director clarified that ... Â»
